origin.thorigins.fox.name: Fox
origin.thorigins.fox.description: Vulpes Are Known For Their Cunning. They Hide In Shadows, Attack Unexpectedly And Strike At Their Enemies' Weakest
power.thorigins.thdash.name: §6§l§nPounce
power.thorigins.thdash.description: By sacrificing defence, pounce forward and boost your attack while falling down.
power.thorigins.thstorage.name: §6§l§nMouth Pouch
power.thorigins.thstorage.description: A 5-slot inventory that saves the items inside upon you death.
power.thorigins.thhunt.name: §6§l§nHunt
power.thorigins.thhunt.description: Hide yourself by crouching and enter a hunting phase after much preparation.
power.thorigins.thswift.name: §a§nAgility
power.thorigins.thswift.description: You have strong limbs that enhance sprinting and jumping abilities, and you're more resilient to fall damage.
power.thorigins.thsmol.name: §e§nSmol
power.thorigins.thsmol.description: Being a fox, you're shorter and have less endurance. But monsters will have a harder time noticing you.
power.thorigins.thweak.name: §c§nWeak
power.thorigins.thweak.description: You were born with slender limbs, which restrict you from using shield and heavy armors.
power.thorigins.thfoxiality.name: §e§nFoxiality
power.thorigins.thfoxiality.description: Embrace your fox nature and thrive.
power.thorigins.thfluffy.name: §e§nFluffy
power.thorigins.thfluffy.description: Shaggy fur provides excellent cold protection but is highly flammable.
power.thorigins.thshy.name: §c§nTimidity
power.thorigins.thshy.description: Survival instincts make you fear predators, death, crowds, and danger, but there are ways to conquer the fears.
power.thorigins.thfood.name: §e§nUnique Taste
power.thorigins.thfood.description: Your food preferences are heavily influenced by your nature.
power.thorigins.thhunger.name: §e§nFast-Paced
power.thorigins.thhunger.description: Your small body has a fast metabolism, granting higher attack speed but requiring frequent large food intake.
power.thorigins.thsound.name: Fox Sound Pack
power.thorigins.thsound.description: In case it isn't obvious, foxes aren't players
origin.thorigin.sneak: Active ability，double tap and hold %s to use
origin.thorigin.cant_sleep_light: It's too bright for you to fall asleep!
origin.thorigin.cant_sleep_shade: Your fox instincts force you to sleep under shades!
origin.thorigin.cant_sleep_fear: You're too scared to fall asleep!
origin.thorigin.cant_sleep_hunt: You're in the middle of hunting!
death.attack.thorigins:foxie_bite: %1$s couldn't handle the claws and fangs of %2$s.
death.attack.thorigins:foxie_bite.player: %1$s underestimated how feral %2$s can be in a fight.
power.thorigins.wakeup.item: You Found Something When You Were Asleep!
thorigins.op_lvl.1: §a§l§oYour OP Level has being adjusted to 1!
thorigins.op_lvl.2: §9§l§oYour OP Level has being adjusted to 2!
thorigins.op_lvl.3: §5§l§oYour OP Level has being adjusted to 3!
thorigins.op_lvl.4: §6§l§oYour OP Level has being adjusted to 4!
thorigins.op_lvl.5: §d§l§oYour OP Level has being adjusted to 5!
